snippet: The housing market has shown signs of life recently, but prices are still falling. That means the market, and the broader economy, are not out of the woods by a long shot.
abstract: Editorial encourages Pres Obama to deliver on his promise to ease refinancings for loans backed by the Federal Housing Administration; warns housing prices are still falling, which means the market, and the broader economy, are not out of the woods; calls on Obama to also follow through on his pledge to aggressively investigate mortgage abuses by banks.
lead_paragraph: The housing market has shown signs of life recently, but prices are still falling. That means the market, and the broader economy, are not out of the woods by a long shot.

headline.seo: How Good Is the Housing News?
headline.main: How Good Is the Housing News?
headline.print_headline: How Good Is the Housing News?
